short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Translate subtitles on the fly from Netflix, SVT Play, CMore, Tv4Play or Disney+.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
For when you want to watch a foreign movie that is missing subtitles in your language. 

Works with Netflix, SVT Play, CMore, TV4Play and Disney+. Feel free to reach out if you would like support for some other service. There might be more generic support coming.

Make sure to go in to the extension settings to set which source & target languages you are using.
